title: Percival & Penelope: First Adventures
description: Join Percival and Penelope, newly graduated Heroes-At-Large, as they set off on their First Adventures. With the help of their good friend Foggywaddle and his clever contraptions, Percival and Penelope travel the globe in search of princes and princesses who are in dire need of a speedy rescue. First Adventures is the first book in the Percival & Penelope adventure series for young readers.
author: Jonathan Blair Smith Sinclair
